title: How to Create Chunky Christmas Cookies in a Jar

steps.headline: Measure all ingredients.
steps.description:
Before you build the gift you’ll want to pre-measure everything beforehand. Measure and place in a separate bowl (per gift):
1 cup toasted shredded coconut
1 cup semisweet chocolate chunks
1/2 cup chopped cashews
1 cup white chocolate chips
3/4 cup red and green M&M’s
1/2 cup Dutch-process cocoa powder
1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
3/4 tsp. salt

steps.headline: Clean/sanitize jar or container.
steps.description: Make sure its well washed and dried before use. Remove tags/stickers prior to use as well.

steps.headline: Create small plastic bag/sachet containing the powder dry ingredients.
steps.description:
Whisk together flour, cocoa powder and salt in a separate bowl. Pour mixture into bag/sachet and seal well. Determine placement of bag. You can either lay bag on the bottom or top of the container or if you were giving the gift inside a gift bag you could simply include it in the bag (consider attaching it somehow to the container so the recipient doesn't forget it is included). {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7e\/Create-Chunky-Christmas-Cookies-in-a-Jar-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Create-Chunky-Christmas-Cookies-in-a-Jar-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/7\/7e\/Create-Chunky-Christmas-Cookies-in-a-Jar-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/aid3463823-v4-728px-Create-Chunky-Christmas-Cookies-in-a-Jar-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

steps.headline: Build chunky cookie jar with ingredients.
steps.description: Your choice on how you want to layer the jar, but make sure each layer is distinct and builds upon each other.

steps.headline: Write recipe card or include baking instructions:
steps.description: Heat oven at 350 degrees and locate a baking sheet. Beat 1 ¼ cups sugar with 1 stick of unsalted butter (brought to room temperature). Add in 1 beaten egg and 1 tsp. vanilla extract. Add chunky cookie mix to batter and fold until well integrated. Scoop a large tablespoons of batter and place on cookie sheet. Bake on the middle oven rack for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove and cool on a wire rack.

steps.headline: Attach the card and decorate or wrap the jar.
steps.description: Give it as a gift and hope that the recipient shares the baked cookies with you!
